body_html: @csarofeen that might work. I think fairseq uses 3d input, so you may need some viewing before and after the addmm call. That should be fine as long as the bias addition is part of the addmm call and not a subsequent in-place addition.
body_text: @csarofeen that might work. I think fairseq uses 3d input, so you may need some viewing before and after the addmm call.  That should be fine as long as the bias addition is part of the addmm call and not a subsequent in-place addition.
body: @csarofeen that might work. I think fairseq uses 3d input, so you may need some viewing before and after the addmm call.  That should be fine as long as the bias addition is part of the `addmm` call and not a subsequent in-place addition.
